long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Diamond Light Source is the UKâ€™s national synchrotron science facility, located at the Harwell Science and Innovation Campus in Oxfordshire. By accelerating electrons to near light-speed, Diamond generates brilliant beams of light from infra-red to X-rays which are used for academic and industry research and development across a range of scientific disciplines including structural biology, physics, chemistry, materials science, engineering, earth and environmental sciences. This extension shows the current machine status.
